string-array.name: motivational_quotes
string-array.item: “Whatever you plan on doing tomorrow, do it today. Whatever you plan on doing today do it right now”
"If you want something you never had, you have to be willing to do something you’ve never done."
"What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make."
"If it’s important, you’ll find a way. If not, you’ll find an excuse".
"The secret to getting things done is to act."
"Focus on being productive instead of being busy."
"Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far."
"You can’t be the person at the top of the water slide over thinking it, you have to go down the chute."
"You see, in life, lots of people know what to do, but few people actually do what they know. Knowing is not enough! You must take action."
"Life is short, do stuff that matters."
" It always seems impossible till it’s done."
"Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort."
"Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.""
"If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.""
"Until we can manage time, we can’t manage anything else."
"Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone."
"While others were dreaming about it, I was getting it done."
"If you end your day feeling like you got nothing done, it's because you weren't working: you were busy, not productive."
